permissions: User must be an admin to create stakeholder classifications (StakeholderClassificationPolicy#create?).
side_effects: Creates a stakeholder classification record; when the title is set or changes, background jobs generate objective stakeholder classifications and update objective OpenAI files.
validation_notes: Title is required and must be unique (case-insensitive). Slug is generated from the title on create and must be unique; it is read-only via the API. Leverage factor must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --leverage-factor
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
